# ApplePayError

**Initializer**

Creates an Apple Pay error object.

## Declaration

```swift
new errorCode(
	ApplePayErrorCode errorCode,
	optional ApplePayErrorContactField contactField,
	optional DOMString message
);
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayError] objects are created using a constructor, as follows:

```javascript
new ApplePayError("shippingContactInvalid", "postalCode", "ZIP Code is invalid")
```

The contact field, [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayErrorContactField], and message parameters are optional. Use them to provide more detailed information that can help users resolve problems on the payment sheet. Some error codes do not require a contact field parameter. See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayErrorCode] for more information.
title: ApplePayError
